title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 94.2 - Demand meters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 94.2 - Demand meters

State Regulations

Electric corporations shall not purchase indicating types
of demand meters after the commission has approved suitable types of such
meters equipped with cumulative registers or other means which permit the
checking of the previous reading. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
94.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
